comments.text: This is a weird when one, when I screen share in vidyo, the other party can see the browser, but I have to work really hard to get it to repaint. It paints individual elements that get invalidated from mouseovers/focus-change/scrolling, but doesn't seem to do full repaints properly when displaying iframes, switching to firefox from vidyo, etc
comments.raw_text: This is a weird when one, when I screen share in vidyo, the other party can see the browser, but I have to work really hard to get it to repaint. It paints individual elements that get invalidated from mouseovers/focus-change/scrolling, but doesn't seem to do full repaints properly when displaying iframes, switching to firefox from vidyo, etc

comments.text: I'm using d2d on i7 with intel gfx
